# periodCount

**Instance Property**

The number of periods that the subscription offer renews for.

## Declaration

```swift
let periodCount: Int
```

## Discussion

If the payment mode is [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionOffer/PaymentMode-swift.struct/payAsYouGo], the period count represents the number of periods the subscription renews at the discounted [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionOffer/price].

The period count is 1 for offers with payment modes [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionOffer/PaymentMode-swift.struct/freeTrial] and [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionOffer/PaymentMode-swift.struct/payUpFront].

## Getting the subscription duration

- **period**: The subscription period for the subscription offer.
